description:
Formation of new entrance & canopy on Norman Street, infilling of light wells to form additional internal floorspace, alterations to roof include the formation of a glazed link addition, sun terrace, part new roof and replacement of existing roof, internal refurbishment of the building to include the provision of improved swimming pool facilities, excavation of basement and refurbished Turkish Baths, New laundry/community room, improved changing rooms and access and a new reception area. (Listed Building Application P092339 also submitted)
This application may affect the character and appearance of the conservation area.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); section 73.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

[LBI reg 23381]: Location Plan; IRB 050A; IRB 051A; IRB 052A; IRB 053A; IRB 054A; IRB 055A; IRB 056A; IRB 057A; IRB 058A; IRB 059A; IRB 060A; IRB 061A; IRB 071A; IRB 073A ; IRB 075A; IRB 076A; IRB 077A; IRB 078A; IRB 078A; IRB 079A; IRB 083A; IRB 086A; Design and Access Statement by Tim Ronalds Architects dated 9th November 2009; Planning Statement by DTZ dated November 2009; Heritage Statement by Alan Baxter dated November 2009; Conservation Statement by Architectural History Practice dated May 2007; Transport Statement by rbm Consulting dated October 2009; Draft Travel Plan by rbm Consulting dated October 2009; Environmental Strategy by Maxfordham dated 3rd November 2009; Statement of Community Involvement by DTZ dated November 2009; Structural Consultants Report by Alan Baxter dated November 2009; Site investigation by Risk Management dated July 2009; An archaeological desktop assessment by PCA dated June 2009; Archaeological Watching Brief by PCA dated November 2009; Bat Report by Fursefen dated August 2009; Pre-construction information by Arcadis dated November 2009; Inspection Report of Existing Building by S & P dated 29th January 2009; Stage 1 Flood Risk Assessment dated October 2009; Acoustic Survey by Maxfordham dated 3rd November 2009; Site Waste Management Plan by Arcadis dated 29th October 2009.

[LBI reg  23382]:  IRB 072C; IRB 074C; IRB 080B; IRB 085B; IRB 088A; IRB 089A; IRB 084

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
